parts.prose: Implement hardware-enforced separation and policy enforcement mechanisms between {{ insert: param, sc-49_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: System owners may require additional strength of mechanism and robustness to ensure domain separation and policy enforcement for specific types of threats and environments of operation. Hardware-enforced separation and policy enforcement provide greater strength of mechanism than software-enforced separation and policy enforcement.
